name: Animal City (Cap 1)
description:
Animal City (La Città degli Animali) 

Instructions: this is a point-and-click adventure game, click/tap to inspect elements, long click/long tap to interact with them.

The game is set in a dystopian city  called La Città degli Animali  (Animal City) and is about the (dis-)adventures of a cat that lives there. 

 If you play the game, I will be happy to get your feedbacks!

When I started this project I didn't find any HTML5-based mobile-friendly engine for 2d point-and-click games. So I wrote my own. It is very simple: I use vue.js directives to dynamically modify the DOM. I exploit the fact that SVG is a HTML-like format so I had  a free level editor: inkscape  :)
